short_summary: Purchase of a High Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of a High Performance Computing Server and related technical specifications. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to view and access solicitations from SSC, submit a response to a solicitation, receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations, be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments, and submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
tags: SSC FileCloud (or equivalent) for CNSC - Amendment 000
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: FileCloud for CNSC
### Official Solicitation Number
SSC-23-00023636:T

### Solicitation Type
[Request for Proposal](#request-for-proposal)
### Publication Date
25 August 2023

### Tender Closing Date
1 September 2023, 14:00 (EDT)

### Contracting Entity
Shared Services Canada
### Address
90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON K0A 0C3, Canada

### Contact Information
#### Technical Contact: Clara Whittaker
 resumes @ SSC-SPC.GC.CA | Phone: 343-553-8354

### Solicitation Description
This solicitation is for the provision of a cloud-based document management system, FileCloud (or equivalent), for the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC).

### Notice URL (None)
### Attachments
Available here: [FileCloud (or equivalent) for CNSC - Amendment 000](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/4E4003F9-E0A8-4B7F-9909-5D6325B01E56)

### Procurement Category
* Government of Canada (GD)
#### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
* World-wide

### Regions of Delivery
* National Capital Region (NCR)

This request for proposal is no longer active. 
---

Whether or not you have bid on a government tender before, following the guidelines and details presented above, you will be better positioned to effectively consider or to compete in the tender process. Consider your collision course before application.  

The following is sample response used to provide an easy way for primary users to use; feel free to initialize and use microsoft excel or an equivalent to alter the sample as you see fit template are used here below:

| Solicitation Number     | Requirement     | Due Date         | Desired Outcome     |
|-------------------------|----------------|------------------|---------------------|
| SSC-23-00023636:T       | FileCloud (or   | 1 September 2023 | Complete all tasks    |
